§3§lHow to use

§r§8The Challenge Addon (CA for short) adds 18 additional challenges to the timer, some with submodes. Each challenge shows a description when activated. Make sure that some challenges are not compatible with each other or with some features from the timer. In this case you will be notified upon activation. Theses can be accessed via 

-/function ca/addon/[name] 
-the menu

While the timer is running, the status of a challenge can be queried in the same ways
on_close_commands: execute if score action timer_menu matches 0 run scoreboard players set id timer_menu 1
execute if score action timer_menu matches 1 run scoreboard players set action timer_menu 0

commands: execute if score mode timer_settings matches 0 run dialogue open @s @a[tag=timer_menu_target] menu_help_look_0_page_1
execute if score mode timer_settings matches 1 run dialogue open @s @a[tag=timer_menu_target] menu_help_look_1_page_1
execute if score mode timer_settings matches 2 run dialogue open @s @a[tag=timer_menu_target] menu_help_look_2_page_2
